title: Augment Gem bundle not giving gems
body: So I bought what in the store showed as the augment bundle with 10 gems and its been over a half an hour almost hour I think and I still don't have my gems. How long does it take for gems to show up if the caches showed up instantly?

replies.body: The Augment Bundle + Gemstone will automatically add the gemstone to your inventory.  You won't see an animation for it.  Keep in mind it's also on a 24 hour cooldown before you can obtain another gemstone bundle.  More details are also available in our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  I hope that helps!
And if they didn't show automatically to my inventory? Do I submit a ticket? this is my first bundle with gems I bought and they still haven't shown up in my inventory

I looked into this for you, and confirmed that a gemstone did appear in your inventory the same moment you purchased the Augment + bundle.  If you'd like specifics about the time or have any concerns, please feel free to reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Oh wow I figured it out now. Somehow my brain read it as more then one gem was in the bundle >.< I'm sorry
Thank you for your help
